Text: David Ivor St. Hubbins is a fictional character in the mockumentary film "This Is Spinal Tap" (1984).

--------------------
Text: David St. Hubbins:  McKean writes in his introduction to "This Is Spinal Tap: The Official Guide", "When I am called upon to generate copy about the mostly fictional entity called Spinal Tap, I usually do so in the mostly fictional character of David St. Hubbins..."
